original_text: I, John, have written about everything that God showed me. These things are a true message from God. They are the things that Jesus Christ says are true.
korean_text: 요한은 하나님의 말씀과 예수 그리스도의 증거 곧 자기가 본 것을 다 증언하였느니라

sentences.original_text: about everything that God showed me
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 내게 보여주신 모든 것에 대해

sentences.original_text: These things are a true message from God
They are the things that Jesus Christ says are true
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 예수 그리스도가 참되다고 말씀하신 것들입니다
